# API Reference

Complete API documentation for pmpl.

## Modules

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 2

styles
formatters
core
```

## Quick Reference

### Style Context Managers

- {func}`pmpl.style` - Apply styles temporarily using a context manager
- {func}`pmpl.set_defaults` - Set global style defaults

### Axis Formatters

- {func}`pmpl.format_horizontal` - Format axes for horizontal plots
- {func}`pmpl.format_vertical` - Format axes for vertical plots
- {func}`pmpl.format_base` - Apply base formatting with customizable grid

### Style Dictionaries

- {data}`pmpl.BASE_STYLE` - Base style configuration
- {data}`pmpl.HORIZONTAL_STYLE` - Style for horizontal plots
- {data}`pmpl.VERTICAL_STYLE` - Style for vertical plots
